title: Drawing, "West View of Bridge at Blenheim Oxfordshire", 1827
medium: Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor
inscribed: Below image the title is written. Ink framing lines surround.
description: View of the lake and bridge at left with the castle in the distance at right. A herd of deer is shown in the foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "West View of Bridge at Blenheim Oxfordshire", 1827.
1827. Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor. Gift of Hamill and Barker. 1961-105-102.
